description.ko: 디지털 파편화의 완벽한 춤, 황량한 기하학적 공허 속에서 질서와 혼돈이 충돌합니다.
description.en: A perfect dance of digital fragmentation, where order and chaos collide in a stark, geometric void.

prompt: A complex 3D isometric labyrinth composed of shifting monochrome voxels and obsidian plates, deconstructing and reconstructing in mid-air. The scene features high-contrast glitch art aesthetics with digital scanlines slicing through the sharp angles of the structure. Reflections of pure white light (#FFFFFF) hit the matte black surfaces (#1A1A1A), creating a stark, high-contrast environment. 8k resolution, raytracing enabled, sharp focus on the fragmented edges. Cinematic lighting with dramatic shadows highlights the geometric chaos and the perfect balance of the digital void.
